owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and intercompany mismatches indicate operational inefficiencies.
FX rates coverage meets policy, but duplicate detection exceptions require monitoring.

residual_risks.description: Entity-level trial balances are not zeroed, which may lead to inaccurate financial reporting.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated checks to ensure trial balances are zeroed by entity before close.

residual_risks.description: High flux analysis exceptions across accounts indicate potential misstatements or unusual activity.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance flux analysis thresholds and investigate exceptions promptly.

residual_risks.description: Open HITL cases may delay compliance reporting and operational close timelines.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Prioritize resolution of HITL cases and streamline case management processes.
